characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. A white sedan is ahead, and a cyclist is on the right side of the road. The cyclist moves closer to the white sedan, eventually causing a collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while observing the white sedan and cyclist ahead. The cyclist moves closer to the white sedan, causing a collision. The self-driving vehicle slows down to avoid further incidents.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the white sedan, causing a collision.
